companyInfo.Competitors: Beacon Hill Staffing Group, PageGroup, Solomon Page

jobDescription: Description: Analytics and Data Governance PURPOSE: This role manages activities around analytics Proof of Concept activities in a variety of business intelligence tools and helps build out Analytics Governance program in conjunction with Director, Data and Analytics Governance. This role is responsible for ongoing data delivery and quality of data provided by secondary data providers. RELATIONSHIPS: This role reports to the Director Data Governance and Analytics Governance, CE Systems and Data. This role interacts on a regular basis with all functions of Commercial Effectiveness & IT. ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS:Analytics Governance:Assists Director of Data and Analytics governance in building analytics governance program and portal. Ensure program is well established and creates framework for ongoing function.Acts as project manager for Proof of Concept and implementation on client Analytics Tools: i.e. Tableau, Qliksense, PowerBI.
